fields.breakfast:
2 boiled eggs
½ avocado
1 slice whole-grain toast
fields.lunch:
100g grilled chicken breast
Mixed greens with 1 tbsp olive oil & lemon dressing
½ cup cooked quinoa
fields.snacks2:
1 low-fat Greek yogurt (100g)
1 tbsp chia seeds
fields.dinner:
80g grilled salmon with lemon & herbs
Steamed broccoli & carrots
½ cup brown rice
fields.notes: This plan is for extreme weight loss and should only be followed under professional supervision. The goal is rapid fat loss with minimal muscle loss. It is not recommended for long-term use.

fields.breakfast:
Scrambled egg whites (4) with spinach & mushrooms
1 slice whole-wheat toast
1 tsp almond butter
fields.lunch:
120g grilled turkey breast
½ cup cooked brown rice
Steamed broccoli & zucchini
fields.dinner:
100g grilled shrimp
Quinoa & roasted bell peppers
1 tsp olive oil
fields.notes: A highly sustainable plan for aggressive weight loss while maintaining muscle mass. Proper for individuals looking to lose weight but not at an extreme pace.

fields.breakfast:
1 whole egg + 3 egg whites omelet
½ avocado
1 slice sourdough toast
fields.lunch:
150g grilled salmon
Roasted sweet potatoes
Mixed leafy greens with olive oil dressing
fields.dinner:
100g grilled chicken
½ cup quinoa
Steamed broccoli & spinach
fields.notes: This plan provides a moderate calorie deficit, perfect for steady weight loss over a longer period. It helps in preserving muscle mass while ensuring enough energy for daily activities.

fields.breakfast:
1 whole egg + 3 egg whites scrambled with mushrooms
1 slice whole-grain toast
1 small banana
fields.snacks:
1 small handful of mixed nuts (20g)
1 small orange
fields.lunch:
150g grilled chicken breast
1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, zucchini, bell peppers)
½ cup brown rice
fields.snacks2:
1 low-fat Greek yogurt (100g)
1 tbsp chia seeds
fields.dinner:
120g grilled fish (e.g., cod, tuna)
Steamed asparagus & quinoa
1 tsp olive oil
fields.notes: Designed for individuals who are moderately active. This meal plan supports fat loss while ensuring energy levels stay balanced throughout the day.

fields.breakfast:
1 whole egg + 4 egg whites scrambled with spinach & bell peppers
1 slice whole-grain toast
1 tsp peanut butter
fields.lunch:
150g grilled lean beef
1 cup roasted sweet potatoes
1 cup mixed greens with balsamic vinaigrette
fields.dinner:
150g baked chicken breast
½ cup quinoa
1 cup steamed broccoli & carrots
1 tsp olive oil
fields.notes: This plan is designed for highly active individuals who still want to maintain a calorie deficit for weight loss. It's balanced to prevent muscle loss while promoting fat reduction.
